pr_title: Add PMD checks and clean up code

timeline.message: Add PMD checks and clean up code

timeline.bodyText: Is logger initalized at this point?
timeline.author: ShirleyZheng92

replies.bodyText: Since it uses system properties, yes it is usable at this point.
replies.author: MikeDombo

timeline.author: ShirleyZheng92

timeline.bodyText: Is this also enforced by the checkstyle rule? Will it be too strict?
timeline.author: ShirleyZheng92

replies.bodyText: Not enforce by checkstyle (otherwise we would have been failing). This is not too strict, it is an easy fix to add the _ as a separator. If we want, we can always disable it.
replies.author: MikeDombo

timeline.author: fahadmohammed01

replies.bodyText: Yes because it was an unused var.
replies.author: MikeDombo

timeline.author: fahadmohammed01

replies.bodyText: Because we access it from an inner class, Java generates an accessor since it is private which they have as a performance issue.
replies.author: MikeDombo
